fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, International co-operation and development, Customs, Business and Industry, Youth, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: INDICAM is monitoring activities running in the EU. The association is managing relations with MEPs, as well as currently following dossier on TM package, plain package tobacco, DSM, IPRs enforcement
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Indicam is the biggest italian association for the defense of IPRs and to help companies fight against counterfeiting. Main goals of the organization are representing them in advocacy activitities, managing their relations with public and enforcement authorities, cooperating with public institutions for the spreding of the culture of IPRs
